details:
noun
- the act of uniform movement
= synonyms: displacement
- the act of changing in form or shape or appearance
= example: the act of changing in form or shape or appearance
= synonyms: transformation
- rewording something in less technical terminology
- a written communication in a second language having the same meaning as the written communication in a first language
= synonyms: rendering
- a uniform movement without rotation
- the process whereby genetic information coded in messenger RNA directs the formation of a specific protein at a ribosome in the cytoplasm
= example: the process whereby genetic information coded in messenger RNA directs the formation of a specific protein at a ribosome in the cytoplasm
- (mathematics) a transformation in which the origin of the coordinate system is moved to another position but the direction of each axis remains the same
